nodes.text: CeSai was a planet. The Galactic Empire controlled CeSai during its reign, and the planet profited from the Imperial presence. However, after the Empire fell to the New Republic, CeSai was left without leadership, and society on the planet collapsed. The family of the Mirialan Maize Raynshi lived on CeSai during Imperial rule, but eventually moved to the planet Merokia.
CeSai was first mentioned in Force Collector, a 2019 novel written by Kevin Shinick.
